description: Use a validly formatted but non-existent pdbId path parameter in fetchPdbHeaderGET, e.g., pdbId='9z99', to test fetching a header for a PDB entry that does not exist in the database.

relevant_endpoints:
#### fetchPdbHeaderPOST
- Method: POST
- Path: /pdb/header
- Parameters:
None
- Request Body Schema:
{'application/json': {'schema': {'type': 'array', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}}}
- Responses:
{'200': {'description': 'OK', 'content': {'application/json': {'schema': {'type': 'array', 'items': {'required': ['pdbId', 'title'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'compound': {'type': 'object', 'properties': {}}, 'pdbId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'PDB id'}, 'source': {'type': 'object', 'properties': {}}, 'title': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'PDB description'}}}}}}}}
#### fetchPdbHeaderGET
- Method: GET
- Path: /pdb/header/{pdbId}
- Parameters:
  - name: pdbId
  - in: path
  - required: True
  - description: PDB id, for example 1a37
  - type: string
- Request Body Schema:
None
- Responses:
{'200': {'description': 'OK', 'content': {'application/json': {'schema': {'required': ['pdbId', 'title'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'compound': {'type': 'object', 'properties': {}}, 'pdbId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'PDB id'}, 'source': {'type': 'object', 'properties': {}}, 'title': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'PDB description'}}}}}}}
